item.title: Foresight Wiki
item.description: Over the last week Iâ€™ve spent some time implementing the new wiki structure and content discussed at Foresight 20/20. All the spaces have been consolidated into 6 major spaces (plus the newsletter): Community Development Documentation and Howtos FAQ Foresight 1.x Getting Involved Content was moved around to the correct spaces. This has resulted in relative links need to be updated on some pages, and the wiki links now reflect the move to the new space, but this is minor in the scheme of things.
